name: sfchronicle
text: “We used up every bit of skill that we’ve learned for high altitude and heavy flying. We had to take the longer way back. We needed more time to climb above the mountains.” https://t.co/zMHQRwVinh

name: sfchronicle
text: Fires Live Updates: Three more deaths were announced in the North Complex fires in Butte County, bringing the total to 12, Sheriff Kory Honea confirmed. He said 13 people are still missing. https://t.co/1o8HNqDFrX

name: sfchronicle
text:
A’s infielder Chad Pinder was scratched from the second game of Oakland’s doubleheader against Texas with a hamstring strain, The Chronicle has learned.

https://t.co/BcJP3hQiZh

name: sfchronicle
text:
When James Juanillo used chalk to write “Black Lives Matter” in front of his S.F. home, he had no idea his actions would put him in the center of a national conversation. 

The attention from his viral encounter has netted him a guest spot on “Dr. Phil."

https://t.co/4tknb121iF

name: sfchronicle
text: The National Weather Service said Saturday that it expects wildfire smoke to mix with fog, adding that “low visibility will make for hazardous driving conditions again tonight” and advising people to “use caution while driving.” https://t.co/DXpG8psvMU

name: sfchronicle
text: Boggs Mountain Demonstration State Forest has been closed to vehicle access because of the “extreme resource drawdown from wildfires across the state" and to "limit potential ignition sources from the Forest,” Cal Fire said. https://t.co/Sh5NWQ9EsZ

name: sfchronicle
text:
A’s one positive development on the injury front Saturday: Shortstop Marcus Semien played both ends of the doubleheader at Texas and hit his first home run since missing five games with a side injury.

https://t.co/qksxOGF7IK

name: sfchronicle
text:
Latest on the #CreekFire burning in Fresno and Madera counties: 

- 196,667 acres burned 
- 6% contained 
- 369 structures destroyed 

See the scope of the blaze on our Fire Tracker: https://t.co/XG3fSAkfDD https://t.co/XjHKNTNRMr

name: sfchronicle
text:
While climate change is a huge issue to Californians who are experiencing its effects with every breath, it isn’t a top issue to most Americans.

That's why Joe Biden hasn't made climate change the centerpiece of his campaign, environmentalists say.

https://t.co/PdU8bzQsYs

name: sfchronicle
text:
Delon Thurston sometimes drives home from work wearing disposable plastic gloves, to soothe her achy hands and wrists after her shifts as a massage therapist. 

But the gloves suggested something different to the Vallejo police officers who arrested her.

https://t.co/oguldnQV7U
